A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: NOT good.  This movie does not fit in so many ways\, with ANY of the other Star Wars movies.  Characters\, battle scenes\, creatures\, values\, story morals... they get it all wrong.  Luke is not Luke.  Leia flying through outer space like Superman after getting blown up?  Are you kidding me?  No.  I can't believe Lucas or anyone else that cares about Star Wars signed off on this.
